title: Party Nutz
directions: 1. Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat the oven to 325°F.

2. Season the nuts:- Melt 2 tablespoons unsalted butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat until just foamy.- Remove from heat and stir in 3 cups mixed raw nuts, 1¼ teaspoons red pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon onion powder, 1½ teaspoons smoked paprika, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt until evenly coated.

3. Toast the nuts:- Spread the seasoned nuts out in an even layer on a baking sheet.- Roast in the oven until golden brown all the way through, about 14 to 18 minutes. Crack open a couple to check that the centers are toasted.

4. Finish and serve:- Immediately grate the zest of ½ lemon over the hot nuts using a Microplane.- Stir well to coat and taste for seasoning. Add more salt if needed.- Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
